content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://*.blastapi.io https://*.binance.org https://*.arbitrum.io https://*.etherscan.io https://*.bscscan.com https://*.arbiscan.io https://*.infura.io https://*.alchemy.com https://*.llamarpc.com https://*.pokt.network https://*.optimism.io https://*.polygon.io https://api.etherscan.io https://api.bscscan.com https://api.arbiscan.io https://api.polygonscan.com https://api-optimistic.etherscan.io https://api-sepolia.etherscan.io https://api-testnet.bscscan.com https://api.coingecko.com https://*.coingecko.com; font-src 'self'; frame-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https://coin-images.coingecko.com https://cryptologos.cc; manifest-src 'self'; media-src 'self'; worker-src 'none';
